english: interrogative/final suffix; what (suffix); how (as in 多么); tiny (archaic)

etymology.type: phono-semantic compound (traditional 麼); simplified 么 is a variant of 幺
etymology.description: semantic: 幺 (‘small, tiny’) + phonetic: 麻; 么 is listed as a variant of 幺.
etymology.interpretation: In the traditional form 麼, 麻 provides the sound value (ma), while 幺 contributes the meaning of smallness or indeterminacy. This semantic nuance helped it develop into a neutral suffix and interrogative/degree particle; the simplified 么 reduces the complex form to a variant shaped like 幺 for ease of writing.
etymology.simplification: Replaced complex 麼 with the simpler 么 (a variant of 幺), reducing strokes and retaining the suffixal/particle function in modern usage.

examples.chinese: 你在做什么(你在做什麼)。
这道题多么难(這道題多麼難)。
为什么这么晚才来(為什麼這麼晚才來)。
examples.english: Why did you come so late?
